name: David Ifeoluwa Adelani
content: About me - David Ifeoluwa Adelani David Ifeoluwa AdelaniAn Assistant Professor at McGill University, Canada Follow Montreal, Canada Email ResearchGate Twitter LinkedIn Github Google Scholar PubMed ORCIDI am an Assistant Professor at McGill School of Computer Science, Canada a Core Academic Member at MILA, and a Canada CIFAR AI Chair (in 2024). . Previously, I was a DeepMind Academic Fellow at UCL, and I obtained a PhD in Computer Science at Saarland University. For more information, see my CVMy research focuses on multilingual NLP and Speech processing especially for low-resource languages. My PhD focused on NLP for African languages but now I am expanding to various regions of the world including South Asia, South-East Asia and Americas indigeneous languages. For more information on my research interests, see my Research Statement.I will be recruiting 1-2 PhD students for fall 2026 (focus on multilinguality + post-training and VLMs for low-resource
